description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake and direct promotion. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked | retired. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Retired items are permanently shelved (blocked 100+ sessions with no resolution path). Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: Add conditional inject dependencies to prompt-inject.json
queue.description: Prompt injects could depend on each other — inject B only if inject A was applied. Add optional 'requires' field to inject schema. Enables sophisticated prompt composition without bloating all prompts.
queue.notes: B#190: Added 'requires' field (string or array) to inject schema. heartbeat.sh two-pass dependency resolution. Usage tracking includes skipped_requires. Tests added. v2 schema.

queue.title: Add engagement diversity history tracking
queue.description: engage-orchestrator --diversity shows current metrics but doesn't track trends. Add diversity-history.json that records HHI, effective platforms, and top-3 concentration after each E session. Enable trend analysis in A sessions.
queue.notes: B#190: Added post-session hook 28-diversity-history.sh, --diversity-trends CLI flag, /status/diversity-trends API endpoint.
